content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

Hello, I am a helpful AI assistant. I can help you write a pig latin transformer in Julia called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. Here is an example of how to do it:  ```julia using Random; const N = 10; const V = ["hello", "world", "how", "are", "you"]; pig_latinify!(v -> convert(String, v)) each Random.choice(V); threads(); ```
